topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack Carrier Grade 2.0: Provision Baremetal Nodes for the Sacramento Deployment

body.p: If you are installing the sacramento template, which includes the KVM region, the baremetal region, ESX storage, and uses HPE DCN VRS networking, follow these instructions to provision baremetal nodes.

section.title: Change Ironic configuration file permissions on baremetal nodes
section.p: The Ironic configuration files contain credentials that could be abused, potentially exposing customer data.
By default, the Ironic configuration files are protected using a chmod permissions of 600 or 700. We strongly recommend that you change the permissions to 400.

ol.li: Log in to the Baremetal controller.ssh cghelion@<BM_Controller_IP>
Execute the following command to change the permission on the ironic-api configuration file:chmod 400 /etc/ironic/ironic-api.conf
Execute the following command to change the permission on the ironic-conductor configuration file:chmod 400 /etc/ironic/ironic-conductor.conf

Execute the following commands to create a switch entry:neutron switch-create --host <switch ip> --username <username> --password <password> --type s5930 --id aa:bb:cc:dd:ee:ff
Where:
<switch ip> is the IP Address of the switch.
id is the MAC address of the switch being created

Execute the following commands to create a new flavor:nova flavor-create baremetal auto 4096 80 2 nova flavor-key baremetal set "capabilities:boot_option"="local" nova flavor-key baremetal set "capabilities:boot_mode"="bios"

Register the Ironic node using the pxe_ipmitool, agent_ipmitool, or agent_ilo drivers. Use one of the three methods to register Ironic. For HP servers, agent_ipmitool and agent_ilo are supported.
agent_ipmitool driver
Execute the following commands to register the Ironic node:ironic node-create -d agent_ipmitool -i ipmi_address=<<ip>> -i ipmi_username=<user> -i ipmi_password=<password> -i ipmi_terminal_port=<terminal_port> -p cpus=<cpus> -p memory_mb=<memory> -p local_gb=<disk_space> -i deploy_kernel=<glance_deploy_kernel_id> -i deploy_ramdisk=<glance deploy ram disk id> i cpu_arch=<cpu_arch>ironic node-update <<node_id>> add properties/capabilities="boot_mode:bios,boot_option:local"
agent_ilo driver
Execute the following commands to register the Ironic node:ironic node-create -d agent_ilo -i ilo_address==<<ip>> -i ilo_username=<user> -i ilo_password=<pass> -p cpus=<cpus> -p memory_mb=<memory> -p local_gb=<disk_space> -i ilo_deploy_iso=<glance deploy iso image> -i cpu_arch=<cpu_arch>ironic node-update <<node_id>> add properties/capabilities="boot_mode:bios,boot_option:local"
pxe_ipmitool driver
Execute the following commands to register the Ironic node:ironic node-create -d ilo_ipa -i ipmi_address=<<ip>> -i ipmi_username=<<user> -i ipmi_password=<<password> -i ipmi_terminal_port=9091 -p cpus=2 -p memory_mb=4096 -p local_gb=80 -i deploy_kernel=<<glance_deploy_kernel_id>> -i deploy_ramdisk=<<glance_deploy_ramdisk_id>> -i cpu_arch=amd64ironic node-update <<node_id>> add properties/capabilities="boot_mode:bios,boot_option:local"

Execute the following command to register the port for the baremetal node:ironic port-create -a <<node_mac_id>> --local-link-connection switch_id="<<switch_id>>" --local-link-connection port_id="<<switch_port>>" --local-link-connection switch_info="ToR" -n <<node_id>>

Execute the following commands to create a tenant network:neutron net-create tenant-network neutron subnet-create --name tenant-subnet --gateway <ip-address> --allocation-pool start=<ip-address>,end=<ip-address> tenant-network <ip-address/prefix>

Execute the following command to Provision the baremetal node: nova boot --nic net-id=<<tenant network id>> --image <<glance image id>> --flavor baremetal --key-name <keypair-name>
Where:
<tenant network id> is the UUID of the tenant network
<image> is the name or ID of image (see 'nova image-list')
<flavor> is the name or ID of flavor (see 'nova flavor-list')
<keypair-name> is the name of the key pair to use nova image-list +--------------------------------------+-----------+--------+--------+ | ID | Name | Status | Server | +--------------------------------------+-----------+--------+--------+ | ca797ded-5fa0-4ef2-8635 | hoscg-2.0 | ACTIVE | | | 2394d02e-2f58-4b85-b9e4 | hoscg-2.0 | ACTIVE | | +--------------------------------------+-----------+--------+--------+
SSH into the provisioned node:: ssh <instance_username>@<instance_ip> -i <nova_key_pair.pem>
